description: Rules for maintaining and synchronizing context across tasks and sessions
content:
# Context Sync Rules

## State Management
- Keep state files current
- Update status regularly
- Track active task
- Maintain progress
- Document changes

## Documentation Sync
- Update all relevant files
- Maintain consistency
- Cross-reference when needed
- Version documentation
- Archive old versions

## Environment Sync
- Track tool versions
- Update dependencies
- Document changes
- Maintain compatibility
- Update security status

## Recovery
- Maintain backup state
- Document recovery steps
- Track session state
- Preserve progress
- Enable resumption
